title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: (2) At a short distance to the left are Ravelston (Lady Keith), and Craigcrook (John Hunter, Esq.), the favourite residence of Lord Jeffrey. (4) On the right, Barnton House (Hon. Mrs. Ramsay). (4-^) Cross the Almond by Cramond Bridge, and pass on the left New Saughton (Lord Aberdour), and Craigiehall (Hope Vere, Esq.) On the shore is the vilhige of Cramond, and on the right the entrance to Dalmeny Park, the seat of the Earl of Rosebery.
